title: Red Fog
description: In 1951, the Nazis return to Stalingrad to raise the defeated 6th Army from their graves to retake Europe with a zombie army. Then, with the 1000 year Reich within his grasp, FÃ¼hrer Martin Bormann goads the allies into a ground war he knows they can never win. It's Band of Brothers meets Walking Dead.
author: Chris    Williams
